#summary How to load external 3D models (like .obj or .m3d)
#labels 3d,model,loader,external,models
This video tutorial will shortly explain how to load 3d models from external files using the [http://code.google.com/p/droidar/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FModelLoaderAdapters model loader adapter extension]:

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ufm-89CkGZk"/>

The following three projects have to be added to your workspace to get the model loader extension running(also explained in the video):

[http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fgdx gdx]

[http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fbackends%2Fgdx-backend-android android backend]

[http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fextensions%2Fmodel-loaders%2Fmodel-loaders model loader extension]

[http://droidar.blogspot.com/2011/10/loading-external-3d-objects.html (Related blogpost)]

*Update*
The gdx project now has a new dependency:
[http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fextensions%2Fgdx-jnigen gdx-jnigen]
